text: In a cozy corner of the big, bustling barn lived Rocco the rat. He watched the other animals play, feeling shy and lonely.
scene: Rocco peeking out from a haystack, watching a group of cheerful animals—sheep, pigs, and chickens—laughing and playing.

character.name: Rocco
character.description: A small, gray rat with big, bright eyes and a fluffy tail. He is timid and loves cheese but is afraid to talk to other animals.
